topics.title: Binding FSIA6B Receiver to Transmitter
topics.description: The speaker explains how to bind the FSIA6B receiver to a transmitter, including the necessary components and steps.
evidence_quotes: bind this FSIA6B receiver to the transmitter
plug the bind key into the last port of the receiver that is actually B-VCC.
lastly just plug the battery into the ESC. So the light in the receiver which will start blinking which actually represents that it is in bind mode.

topics.title: Components Needed for Binding
topics.description: The speaker lists the necessary components required to bind the receiver, including an ESC, battery, and bind key.
evidence_quotes: So for this purpose you need an ESC and a battery to power the receiver and a bind key.

topics.title: Plugging in Components
topics.description: The speaker explains how to plug in the components, including the bind key into the receiver and the BEC wire from the ESC.
evidence_quotes: You have to plug the bind key into the last port of the receiver that is actually B-VCC.
Take the BEC wire of the ESC which is actually the to input power for to the receiver and plug it in any of the port of the receiver.
